body_content.explanation: to add different harmonies (= sounds made by different notes being played or sung at the same time) to a piece of music:
examples: I want to reharmonize the song to bring out the beauty of the melody.
The next two bars repeat the melody and reharmonize its close.

body_content.explanation: to become suitable for a particular situation again, or to make different people, plans, situations, etc. suitable for each other again:
examples: She urged us to reharmonize with ancient forms of knowledge.
We need to re-harmonize our bodies to the patterns and cycles of nature.
